episodes.synopsis: A look at royal weddings asks whether the imagination of the world is captured by media and marketing, or a love of romance, tradition and grandeur.
episodes.title: Royal Weddings

episodes.synopsis: Complex symbolism and superstitions surround royal death spectacles and impact public views on the monarchy, as seen in the funeral of Elizabeth I.
episodes.title: Royal Funerals

episodes.synopsis: A look at what royal teens dealt with in the past and face now explores how life in the public eye affects them, and how they date, rebel and grieve.
episodes.title: Royal Teens

episodes.synopsis: Scandals rock the monarchy, from Edward VIII's abdication for the love of a divorcée to the controversial affair that led to Diana's tragic death.
episodes.title: Royal Scandals

episodes.synopsis: New rules of royal succession and the birth of a new prince cause a global frenzy, as he follows Princess Diana's footsteps into the world spotlight.
episodes.title: Royal Babies

episodes.synopsis: A look at a centuries-old obsession with pets shows how royals kept exotic creatures at the Tower of London and used animals to build their images.
episodes.title: Royal Pets

video.title: The Royals
video.synopsis: This documentary examines Britain's royal family phenomenon, showcasing its role in English life through interviews with those in the know.
